title: Global net income of Levi Strauss 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Net income in million U.S. dollars
summary: In 2019 , Levi Strauss received gross income for 394.98 units of its net narrow-body jet airliner series , but net income after cancellations and changes ( under the ASC 606 revenue recognition standard ) came to a devastating negative 183 units .
The slump in net income came as a result of the jet maker 's net MAX crisis .
Levi Strauss delivered some 18 units of its net income to Delta Air Lines in 2014 .
gold: In 2019 , Levi Strauss ' net income amounted to approximately 394.98 million U.S. dollars.
The company is most well-known for denim jeans brand , Levi 's , however they produce many different types of apparel products.
Levi Strauss & Co. Levi Strauss & Co. ( Levi 's ) is an apparel company that designs , markets and sells jeans , casual wear and other related accessories for men , women and children .
